objects.description: [HIUPAN](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1230) has checked periodically for removable drives and installs itself when a drive is detected.(Citation: 2025_IBM_PUBLOAD_TONESHELL_HIUPAN_CLAIMLOADER_MUSTANG PANDA)(Citation: Trend Micro MUSTANG PANDA PUBLOAD HIUPAN SEPTEMBER 2024)
